mapper.select: select count(b.company_id) as num from emer.company_info a left outer join emer.delivery b on(a.company_id=b.company_id)
select count(b.company_id) as num from emer.company_info a left outer join emer.storeage b on(a.company_id=b.company_id)
select count(b.company_id) as num from emer.company_info a left outer join emer.machine b on(a.company_id=b.company_id)
select count(b.company_id) as num from emer.company_info a left outer join emer.website b on(a.company_id=b.company_id)
select sum(a.in_day) as in_day,sum(a.out_day) as out_day,sum(a.save_day) as save_day from emer.company_info a INNER JOIN emer.website b on(a.company_id=b.company_id)
